sections.heading: authorized.Any two or more contiguous and adjacent cities of the first class in the state may merge by complying with the requirements and procedures specified in the First-Class City Merger Act
sections.text: Merger shall not be allowed across county lines.SourceLaws 2008, LB1056, ยง 3.

16-1103.Merger authorized.

Any two or more contiguous and adjacent cities of the first class in the state may merge by complying with the requirements and procedures specified in the First-Class City Merger Act. Merger shall not be allowed across county lines.

SourceLaws 2008, LB1056, ยง 3.
